title: The Shroud of Michael Jackson
post: I think the auction listing got deleted already. Ebay is real tough, I’m sure they closed it as soon as they got wind of it because it would surely be a hoax or fraud. It’s a clever idea for a Halloween auction though. But I doubt the family would see any humor in it.
author: AnnieCee
